discourse_list.title: \xf0\x9f\x9a\xa8 DAO Donation Request for EarthQuake Relief Fund in Turkiye

content.content: Turkiye is struggling with the earthquake disaster and we’re calling for your help! TL;DR:   Thousands of people have been killed in Turkiye as a result of earthquakes with magnitude 7.8 and 7.5. Current death toll is 9057, current Injured is 52979.   AHBAP Derneği with 30 thousands volunteers is a well known and most trusted Turkish NGO that is dedicated to improving the lives of families, individuals, and communities by promoting policies that support their welfare and rights. It’s authorized by the financial authorities in Turkiye and a legit way to support the Turkish community in this terrible situation. They also work in cooperation with AFAD (Disaster and Emergency Management Presidency) in cases of disasters.   Currently, ~3.5 Million USD in crypto is donated to Ahbap’s crypto wallets by 4500+ contributors.   Current Situation Thousands of people have been killed in Turkey as a result of earthquakes with magnitude 7.8 and 7.5. In the last 48 hours, there were more than 100 aftershocks that caused widespread destruction. The quakes and aftershocks toppled buildings and sent rescuers scrambling through the rubble to find survivors. The death toll was expected to rise with experts warning that aftershocks could continue for days or weeks. Millions of people are living in temporary shelters, cars and containers with very limited supplies of food, water, clothes and electricity. For more details visit CNN live updates: Current Death Toll : 9057+ Current Injured : 52979+ Who we are: Turkiye Earthquake Relief DAO A non-profit DAO created to help the victims of the earthquake disaster in Turkiye and fund non-profit organizations directly. Turkiye was struck by a 7.8 mg earthquake. A “level 4” alarm that calls for international assistance is declared. Those around the world reading this For more details: Notion – The all-in-one workspace for your notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Legitimacy check: One of the biggest Turkish crypto exchanges Paribu shared Turkiye Earthquake Relief DAO tweet: https://twitter.com/ParibuCom/status/1623291018467590153?s=20&t=ShQUWkqeP47V4dm3muO8OQ Solana supported Turkiye Earthquake Relief DAO: https://twitter.com/solana/status/1623038568892403723?s=20&t=ShQUWkqeP47V4dm3muO8OQ Request: Considering this difficult situation Turkish people are going through, we kindly request donations to be transferred to the Ahbap foundation’s wallet addresses with DAO voting! AHBAP Derneği is a well known Turkish NGO that is dedicated to improving the lives of families, individuals, and communities by promoting policies that support their welfare and rights. It operates within Turkey and aims to raise awareness about important social issues and advocate for positive change. Ahbap makes great effort in the areas impacted by the Earthquake right now. Why should Gitcoin DAO support Turkiye Earthquake Relief Funds? Turkiye is having a Level-4 crisis which requires international support. This is a humanitarian cause to support Turkiye. Turkiye has more than 8 million crypto users & traders. The Turkish community is one of the largest and most active communities in the global crypto ecosystem. In the disaster zone, there are millions of crypto users waiting for global support. It is a give-back opportunity for the Gitcoin DAO to the Turkish community. The Turkish community will never forget this support. Above all, we’re all in this together. It is our earth and our people dying & suffering as a result of this terrifying earthquake. Donate to : Haluk levent - Ahbap NGO As described above, Ahbap is running a government permitted crypto donation campaign. It’s authorized by the financial authorities in Turkiye. It’s a legit way to support the Turkish community in this terrible situation. Here are the wallet addresses you can donate to: BNB Chain Network: 0xB67705398fEd380a1CE02e77095fed64f8aCe463 Ethereum Network: 0xe1935271D1993434A1a59fE08f24891Dc5F398Cd Avalanche Network: 0x868D27c361682462536DfE361f2e20B3A6f4dDD8 Important: Do not send crypto to these addresses on other networks as they are not EOAs. Otherwise, the funds will most definitely get lost irrevocably. Proof of Addresses: https://twitter.com/ahbap/status/1622963311514996739 For more background story: Dlnews : Crypto donations to Turkey surpass $2m as rock star’s fundraiser green-lit by govt – DL News Coindesk: https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/02/07/turkish-nonprofits-raise-millions-of-dollars-in-crypto-for-earthquake-response/ The Block: The Block: Turkish rock star and charity establish crypto donation wallet for earthquake support Some Support Given to Ahbap from crypto ecosystem:   Avalanche: Avalanche Foundation donated 1 Million USD in AVAX to Ahbap  BNB Chain: BNB Chain Address is verified on BSC Scan  ETHGlobal: Shared and supported the campaign.  Currently, 3 Million USD in crypto is donated to Ahbap’s crypto wallets. You can track the donation at this Nansen Dashboard
Turkey needs urgent help. Thank you for your concern
TURKEY NEEDS HELP! Please do everything you can. Raise awareness!
Please help Turkey! Raise awareness!

Thanks so much for your post. Unfortunately there is not so much Gitcoin itself can do. We are between rounds, so there are no matching funds to distribute. However you can always create a Grant on our platform, it will however not be quadratically matched at this time, more on this here. I will do my share by linking your great overview post in the Twitter thread, by our friends at Giveth. Hope this helps & thank you for all that you do.
Turkey really needs your help! More than 14000 people lost their lives in earthquakes. Please donate
Turkey needs a lot of help right now.  Facing a major disaster. Right now has a over 14.000 death. This earthquake affected 10 provinces

Turkey needs help immediately! So many people died and they are still dying. Experts fear the onset of epidemics. There are huge problems with hygiene. There is a need for a mobile toilet, medicine and cleaning supplies are needed. It’s very cold people need thick clothes, blankets, quilts.

Every donation means a lot for the people here, your donation may be food for orphaned children or heating for the people in the freezing weather. Turkey really needs help right now and every single help counts.
A huge earthquake occured in Turkey. People who are aggrieved need your help. We need donations, supply whatever.
100 hours passed, still people are being rescued, please everyone help
Turkey need your help, please donate. Thanks from now

I would like to talk a little bit about the situation in order for you to understand the extent of the earthquake in Turkey. Earthquakes in Turkey have directly affected approximately 13.5 million people, leaving them homeless. People who survived the earthquake that took place during the night hours when sleep was at its deepest had to struggle with harsh winter conditions. In total, 6444 buildings were destroyed. When you consider the average number of apartments in these apartments and the demographic structure in the region, it would not be difficult to predict that the number of deaths will increase very rapidly, not linearly, but parabolicly. It’s the fourth day of the earthquake and the death toll is about to reach 20 thousand. Only the number of injured in the wreckage is 60 thousand and those who survived the earthquake from the 4th day will unfortunately have lost their lives due to the inadequacy of the rescue teams. the disaster in Turkey; It is one of the biggest earthquake disasters of the last century.

Thanks @mrtdlgc for sharing this  It’s truly heartbreaking to hear of how many people are hurting from this. Just want to share this link here as well to a project by Gnosis DAO - raising funds on Giveth (on gnosis chain) and bridging them to Ahbap NGO. There are low gas fees for donations on gnosis chain, and the project is verified so donors get GIV back for donating - it’s just another way to support this cause.
Turkey really needs your help! More than 14000 people lost their lives in earthquakes. Please donate!
Turkey needs help immediately!
people need you guys just one click will be enough
Turkey really needs help right now and every single help counts.
Greetings to all of you… Turkey is struggling with an earthquake in harsh winter conditions… The same conditions exist in Syria… Please help these beautiful people… Best Regards…
Please help Turkey! You can save lives!

Thanks for your response Kris. Afaik, I got the impression that Gitcoin is not willing to move this initiative to a DAO vote on Snapshot. If that is the case, would you please close this thread and in return, if you could just pin it so that at least individual donations may still continue? And I do know how to create a Grant on Gitcoin for sure. This was just a temperature check submitted to the Gitcoin DAO to see if there’s enough support for some kind of a matching fund for further collaboration with this funding effort.

Our new platform is going through some fixes and as such, we can’t run any more matching rounds until March - that said, if there is still a need (and I imagine there will be), I would be behind working to set up a specific matching pool in the March cohort of “test rounds” we’re planning for causes specifically supporting the earthquake relief efforts. Do you think that would still help support those in need?

Thank you Connor, we all are very emotional because of the past few days, seeing and living the tragedy of the earthquake around us and try to solve things as fast as possible. How can we stay on top of this and start the process in march should we remind you again or will you get back to us?
Please help Turkey! Turkey needs your help!

Dear Gitcoin family, We’ve been hit with a massive earthquake. Lives lost and still many people are under rubble. We need to stand together. if you are in a position to help, please don’t hesitate. We need your support.
Türkiye need your help, please donate and raise awareness
We must all do our best for the disaster in Turkey. Please don’t hesitate to support.
Thousands of children and adults are need help after two deadly and devastating earthquakes hit Turkey. Support Turkey and Turkish people with your donations.
Help Turkey. A penny matters!

This is absolutely a tragedy and I don’t mind at all that you’ve posted a request for help here. I’d encourage everyone to chip in. I am unsure if this is simply a request for donations from individuals (and maybe Gitcoin if it was possible) or if you are looking for assistance in dispersing the funds. As for the request, here is my contribution Additionally, I’d love to work with a designer from the Turkish community to create 3 tiers of POAPs Tier 1 - $10 or more Tier 2 - $100 or more Tier 3 - $1,000 or more We can work with the POAP team and FDD analysts to retroactively send out the POAPs to anyone who donates to the addresses above or to a specific gitcoin donation address if preferred. That might be better. What does everyone think about this plan? Calling in attention support from MMM @CoachJonathan @Viriya @garysheng
Thousands of people are waiting for even small amounts. Help Turkey!

This disaster that befell Turkey is one of the worst earthquakes of recent years. There are tens of thousands dead and injured, millions of homeless people. Your help is very important to humanity. HELP TURKEY!
Turkey needs your urgent help. Any help will be beneficial, please do not underestimate the disaster.

@mrtdlgc @timucinylmz @yigitogz et all, Hi from Supermodular. We’d be interested in hosting a flash QF round for you, using Gitcoin’s protocols, to distribute aid on the ground. Can you please join this telegram ( Telegram: Join Group Chat ) and we can coordinate something there? Best, Kevin

By the way, thanks for this idea. As far as I know, Turkey Relief DAO is already working on some designs that we plan to initiate through POAP checkout. I will DM you on Discord or wherever you feel comfortable with me sending you a DM once we launch it. Thanks a lot  I can also contact zer8 as we almost daily talk to each other in our 1hive groups

Hello @krrisis Hello @connor Thanks for your responses. we all are very emotional because of the past few days, seeing and living the tragedy of the earthquake around us and try to solve things as fast as possible. How can we stay on top of this and start the process in march should we remind you again or will you get back to us?
Global help & assistance is needed! We, Turkey, can use the all help we can get! Please help and spread the word!

What has happened in Turkey (and Syria, which was oddly left off) is an absolute human tragedy on an unfathomable scale.  But GitcoinDAO is not a charity.  A dedicated QF round could be appropriate, not direct donations from the DAO.
Earthquakes that hit Turkiye and Syria must be helped to relieve the victims.
every penny that you dont care, has a meaning for somebody! Help Türkiye
